IEA2024-Numberofstart-ups: The first set of indicators is related to start-up creations. Those indicators will give a measure of the amount of entrepreneurship within the relevant sector (as identified by the tags).
Country of the start-up in ISO3 format

High-level sector used to group start-ups (including non-energy, energy-and-digital, energy-and-non-digital, energy-and-green, 
energy-and-not-green) or energy technology field (wind, solar, etcÅc)
Number of companies in the sector, country and year
